mapper.select:
SELECT hpmc as countName, count(hpmc) as countNum FROM anlian_bill GROUP BY hpmc ORDER BY count(hpmc) DESC
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT cargoname as countName, count(cargoname) as countNum FROM wuliu_bill GROUP BY cargoname ORDER BY count(cargoname) DESC
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT vehicletypename as countName, count(vehicletypename) as countNum FROM wuliu_member_vehicle GROUP BY vehicletypename ORDER BY count(vehicletypename) DESC
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT vehicleprefix as countName, count(vehicleprefix) as countNum FROM wuliu_member_vehicle GROUP BY vehicleprefix ORDER BY count(vehicleprefix) DESC
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT venderid as countName, count(venderid) as countNum FROM wuliu_bill GROUP BY venderid ORDER BY count(venderid) DESC
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT venderid as countName, count(venderid) as countNum FROM anlian_bill GROUP BY venderid ORDER BY count(venderid) DESC
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT ownerid as countName, count(ownerid) as countNum FROM wuliu_bill GROUP BY ownerid ORDER BY count(ownerid) DESC
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT ownerid as countName, count(ownerid) as countNum FROM anlian_bill GROUP BY ownerid ORDER BY count(ownerid) DESC
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT desc1 as countName, billno as remark, ptBegintime as timeBegin FROM anlian_bill ORDER BY ptBegintime DESC
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT routeid as countName, waybillno as remark, begintime as timeBegin FROM wuliu_bill ORDER BY begintime DESC
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
